# Bug Report
## Description
Please put here what your issue is. Be as verbose as possible.

## Checks
Fill out the questions below to help track down what the issue is

**Where did it occur?**
> Where the issue occurred, ie. Ragefire Chasm

**What is being interacted with?** 
Mark off any that apply `[x]`
> - [ ] The Minimap
> - [ ] The World Map
> - [ ] pfQuest tracker display
> - [ ] Quest log menu
> - [ ] pfQuest journal
> - [ ] pfQuest config
> - [ ] pfQuest routes
> - [ ] pfQuest routes arrow
> - [ ] pfQuest quest markers
> - [ ] pfQuest `/db` command
> - [ ] Quest chat links

## Examples
Screenshots are lovely, paste them here if you got 'em

## Error Text
```
If you receive a `Lua Error` popup, you can select all text and paste here, otherwise either delete or leave this section as-is.
```
